title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!

sources.title: Django Kill
sources.description: Various factions, including a half-breed bandit, a gang of homosexual cowboys and a priest, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

metadata.Plot: The Stranger, a half-breed bandit, is part of a band of thieves that steals a cargo of gold from a stagecoach. However, the Americans in the band betray him and shoot all the Mexicans. The Stranger is not completely dead though, and crawls his way out of his shallow grave, continuing his pursuit of the gold and exacting a bloody vengeance.
metadata.Writer: Franco Arcalli, Giulio Questi, María del Carmen Martínez Román
metadata.Actors: Tomas Milian, Marilù Tolo, Piero Lulli
